sect1.title: Changelog
sect1.para: This is version &version; of the Linux From Scratch Editor's Manual, dated &releasedate;.
Below is a list of changes made since the previous release of the book, first a summary, then a detailed log.

listitem.para: Added a Makefile for easier rendering.
chapter04/commenting.xml: Added, to document the use of FIXME:.
chapter02/svnssh.xml: Explain how to check out the whole tree
chapter04/introduction.xml: Spell out a little more policy.
chapter06/updatebook.xml: Remove requirement to upload package source, mention that we prefer the maintainer's native format instead of .bz2, and move 'commit your changes' to renderchecklinks.xml.
General: Replace references to bugzilla by trac
General: Thanks to Manuel for pointing out some things I had missed.
General: Correctly tag mailing list addresses
chapter06: Minor wording improvements and remove mention of FTP updates as this is handled by the FTP maintainers now.
chapter05/fixbug.xml and chapter05/enternewbugs.xml: Minor wording improvements
chapter04/introduction.xml, chapter04/checkrender.xml: Mention the Makefile and validation of XML
chapter03/commit.xml: Minor wording and tagging improvements. Also add explanation of -F option to svn commit
chapter03/update.xml: Minor wording and tagging improvements
chapter03/checkout.xml: Minor wording and tagging improvements
chapter03/introduction.xml: Minor wording and tagging improvements
chapter02/svnssh.xml: Minor wording and tagging improvements
chapter02/introduction.xml: We use viewcvs for online repository browsing, not cvsweb
chapter01/introduction.xml: Reworded explanation of book XML structure - we use XIncludes now, not entities.
Removed unnecessary comments about CVS in chapter 3 moving, thanks Randy McMurchy
Swapped revision order in chapter 3 diff, thanks Matthew Burgess
Added a changelog, stylesheets and a Makefile.
Updated text in the preface, swapped CVS for Subversion.
